word_mean: 反刍动物：胃具有4个完整腔室(瘤胃、蜂窝胃、重瓣胃和皱胃)的动物。该目动物包括牛、绵羊、山羊、鹿和羚羊

sentence.Network_en: The teeth of ruminant animals are specialised.
sentence.Network_cn: 反刍家畜的牙齿很特殊。

sentence.Network_en: The teeth of the ruminant are specialised, unlike those of a carnivorous animal.
sentence.Network_cn: 反刍家畜的牙齿很特殊, 完全不同于肉食动物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin ruminant- 'chewing over again', from the verb ruminari, from rumen 'throat' (see rumen)

means.word_mean: 1. any of various cud-chewing hoofed mammals having a stomach divided into four (occasionally three) compartments
1. related to or characteristic of animals of the suborder Ruminantia or any other animal that chews a cud;
